itunes:title: Psalm 119 Week 2 with Christy Nockels
title: Psalm 119 Week 2 with Christy Nockels
description:
For the second and final week of our Psalm 119 series, Raechel and Amanda sit down with songwriter, author, and chicken mama, Christy Nockels. The women connect over their shared love for Psalm 119 and explore how the psalm is both a songbook for personal prayer and an invitation into God’s love. Touching on everything from alphabets and acrostics to bonfires and blueberries, they meditate on the unchanging truth of God’s Word and its profound ability to comfort us during times of joy and affliction. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 20% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code SUB20. August’s box will include our upcoming Study Book, The Presence of God.

Survey:
We’d love to get to know you more and hear about your listening experience! Visit SheReadsTruth.com/Survey to share podcast feedback with our team. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/psalm-119-week-2-with-christy-nockels/
